page.title: 18Marldon.Style Park Nursery.
page.content: {Style Park nursery} has grown from being a small market garden in 1973 to a large{garden centre }covering 6 acres.The centre as a nursery where seeds and cuttings are grown.Apart from selling the plants,shrubs and tres,there is a shop which sells an extensive range of things from containers to greenhouses and trowels to rotovators. As the nursery is on an exposed site much emphasis has been placed on wind protection and shade structures. Around the perimeter mixed hedges have been planted.Extensive use of green plasic netting has been made for breaking the force of the windand to give shade. The site has been designed to make the greatest use of mechanisation and for ease of transport in and out of the centre.
